title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV25-687)
description: On October 20, 2025, ABB published security advisories to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Terra AC wallbox (UL40/80A)  versions 1.8.32 and prior
Terra AC wallbox (UL32A)  versions 1.8.2 and prior
Terra AC wallbox (CE)  multiple versions and platforms
Terra AC wallbox (JP)  versions 1.8.2 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
